sentences.sContent: Their father was a bandleader and their mother taught harmony singing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their father was a bandleader and their mother taught harmony singing.
sentences.sCn: 他们的父亲是伴舞乐队的指挥，他们的母亲教授合唱。

words.tran: 乐队指挥；军乐队或管乐队首度

trans.tranOther: someone who  conduct s  a band, especially a dance or  jazz  band
